name: Suspicious Curl Change User Agents
description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows with set useragent options
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR process.pe.product:The\ curl\ executable) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-A\ * OR *\ \-\-user\-agent\ *))`
